column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH:------ Â A Chinese construction worker died on the site of the RHB building
column11: a 57-year-old Chinese worker was reportedly  on the fourth floor
column12: when a difficult job meant he needed to detach his safety gear.------He slipped and fell and was taken to Calmette Hospital
column13: where doctors confirmed his death of internal injuries due to the fall.------The dead body was handed over to the family for ceremonies at Wat Teukla
